question:
Eating too much sugar is harmful for health. Some people think that it is government responsibility to limit people’s sugar consumption, while others think that it is individuals responsibility to limit the amount of sugar they eat.

Discuss both views and give your opinion.
text: In all, there are about fifteen steps, from the author's idea to the book's publication.

The first step is to get an idea, the writer thinks about a new idea, writes his first writing on a draft and after that the process of preparation, the writer also corrects by editing his writing to beautify his novel.  Once ready the writer will submit the results of his writing to the agency.

The author of the novel will be asked to sign a contract with the agency and afterwards the Agency will send a copy of the novel to the publishing house.The editor made an offer for the novel and discussed all the various negotiations such as issues in the contract, strange design, changes in the contents of the different and others.  After all parties have agreed, the final draft will be drafted and copied.
Until the final stage, the publishing house will develop a strategy in marketing, contacting the bookseller.  Then the novel is published and sold
